tool_description: A free public service API which provides pictures of animals with mlems/bleps.
name: MlemAPI
title: MlemAPI

api_list.name: New mlem
api_list.description: Returns one most recently published mlem image in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mlemapi.p.rapidapi.com/newmlem"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mlemapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Mlem ID
api_list.description: Returns one mlem image by ID in JSON
